content.raw:
I’m happy with this, but in addition I think that `self.previous_default_output_folder` needs to be set in `load_configuration` \(inside [this](#!/cbillington/runmanager/src/c817a8ed10360072595b5270a670b76a357049a9/__main__.py#lines-3242) if statement it should be set to `default_output_folder` otherwise `''`\), and in `on_reset_shot_output_folder_clicked` it should be set to the `current_default_output_folder`

At least that's what I think from looking at the code briefly
content.html:
I’m happy with this, but in addition I think that self.previous_default_output_folder needs to be set in load_configuration (inside this if statement it should be set to default_output_folder otherwise ''), and in on_reset_shot_output_folder_clicked it should be set to the current_default_output_folder

At least that's what I think from looking at the code briefly

content.raw:
`self.previous_default_output_folder` is being updated when the labscript file changes, so it is already occurring during `load_configuration` \(regardless of whether the user was using the default output folder or not\). 

The default should not change if you are setting the shot output folder to the default, so I don’t think it needs updating there either.

I think we’re good. Merging!
content.html:
